title: Hour 1 - Greg Sankey (06-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Greg Sankey (06-22-20)
description:
SEC Commissioner Greg Sankey tells Dan that we are well past the confederate flag in Mississippi. Greg says he agrees with the change of the term Ole Miss and was convinced when he saw the post of some Ole Miss football players taking a stand for change.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
SEC Commissioner Greg Sankey tells Dan that we are well past the confederate flag in Mississippi. Greg says he agrees with the change of the term Ole Miss and was convinced when he saw the post of some Ole Miss football players taking a stand for change.
